Plot: A pack of teenagers run for their lives through the swamps of Louisiana, as they are chased by Mr. Jangles, a man possessed by 13 evil souls who is relentless in his pursuit of new victims.
Title: Venom
Writer: Flint Dille (screenplay), John Zuur Platten (screenplay), Brandon Boyce (screenplay), Flint Dille (story), John Zuur Platten (story)
Actors: Agnes Bruckner, Jonathan Jackson, Laura Ramsey, D.J. Cotrona
tomatoConsensus: A voodoo horror flick without the mojo, Venom is chock full of gory impalings of interchangeable teenage girls and hunky guys by an unstoppable zombie whose unimaginative rampage quickly lulls us to sleep.
